content: we decided to release #harmonscrunchie as a free pattern as the perfect accessory to the harmon halter 1 both patterns were inspired by two things my love for motorsport and queen s gambit the iconic checkerboard design represents both the chequered flag of a race and a chess board the harmon scrunchie is a quick knit that can easily be made in an evening we hope you love knitting this pattern as much as we enjoyed designing it any questions regarding pattern help please e-mail us and we will try to respond as soon as possible <3 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/harmon-halter-top-queens-gambit
